name: Requiem (itch) (Immersion Games - BloodLilly, rathhunter)
description:
Your time has come, the apocalypse is nye and it is your duty to collect the contracts stored in the nine rings of hell. Those before you, War, Famine and Pestilence have failed and require your aid to complete the purpose you were created for. 

Death it is your honour to collect those contracts, free your brothers and travel through the nine rings to begin the apocalypse.

But beware, the demons and keepers of hell do not want their luxury and power to dwindle, as no new souls mean no more contracts which aid in their ability to be powerful conduits within hell. They will try to stop you, you have no means of fighting back, use your wits and the environment to complete your task.

Luck be with you.

Game Created by Immersion Games
Game Designer, Programmer & AI Designer: Ozymandias
Artist, Game Designer & Level Designer: BloodLilly
3D Assets: Synty

Music Used
City Catacombs (Dungeon): Joel Steudler
Wilderness Paths (Field): Joel Steudler
